= ギリシャ文字 =
ギリシャ文字は英語ではないが、外国語ということでまとめておく。
||大文字 ||小文字 ||読み ||
||&Alpha; || || ||
|| || || ||
|| || || ||
|| || || ||

= 日常 =
== よく使う言い回し ==
||by the day ||work by the day. ||
|| ||日当で働く||
||day by day ||being warming day by day. ||
||day after day ||working day after day. ||
|| ||来る日も来る日も働いている。 ||
||respectively ||Let x, y and z be 2, 3 and 5, respectively. ||
||the above ||The above is the gist of his article. ||
|| ||以上が彼の論旨である。 ||
||the custom ||The custom is wear clothes when going out. ||
|| ||慣習として外にいる時は服を着る。 ||

== 単語 ==
||蛍光 ||fluorescent ||

== 単数/複数とThe ==
||嘘||you told a lie. ||
||服||put on a formal dress. ||
||礼服に着替える ||

== 例外 ==
||dimension ||普通ならdimentionとなるところ。||
||referring ||普通ならはreferingとなるところ。||
||Let K be a field ||Let K is a fieldと言いそうなところ||

= プログラミングの言い回し =
== 括弧 ==
||{{{{}}}}||parenthesis
||{{{()}}}||curry bracket
||{{{[]}}}||box bracket
||{{{<>}}}||angle bracket

= 数学と物理の言い回し =
== of/on/over ==
	* Let PA be a power set of the set A.
	* Let FA be a free semigroup on the set S.
	* Let RA be a module over the ring R.

== denote ==
次の文は同じ意味である。
	* We denote the world by W.
	* We denote by W the world.
	* We denote W as the world.

== 単語 ==
||convolution ||畳み込み ||
